techmeme.title: France's antitrust regulator has notified Meta of a potential antitrust violation, accusing it of abusing its dominant position in the online ad sector (Benoit Berthelot/Bloomberg)
Sources: OpenAI plans an AI-powered web browser with some user interactions within a ChatGPT-like native chat interface instead of clicking through to websites (Reuters)
MaintainX, which makes maintenance and operations software, raised a $150M Series D at a $2.5B valuation, bringing its total funding to $254M (Ateev Bhandari/Reuters)
YouTube is updating its monetization guidelines on July 15, defining "inauthentic" content as "mass-produced and repetitious" amid concerns over AI slop (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
OpenAI officially closes its ~$6.5B acquisition of Jony Ive's startup, which it refers to as io Products, after a trademark suit from hearing device startup Iyo (Hayden Field/The Verge)
